ModMetaData.name: The Edge of Abyss (v1.0.0)
ModMetaData.author: Vectorial1024
ModMetaData.description:
Inspire hope among your people, or not. Maintain high hope for some extra mood bonus, or tolerate low hope to gaze into the edge of abyss.
- Safe to add to existing saves - Safe to remove from ongoing saves (for now) - Should have no problems with other mods
